body:
I'm not sure why this makes a difference - and it seems to be failing on the CI build :(. Is it a matter of CMake version inconsistency?

I also had to modify this file to get the right thing to happen on Windows: the replacement I used there was:

``` cmake
add_custom_command(TARGET highwayhash_copy_headers_to_destination PRE_BUILD
COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${highwayhash_INSTALL}/include/ ${highwayhash_INCLUDE_DIR}/highwayhash)
```

Would that maybe work in both cases?

body_text:
I'm not sure why this makes a difference - and it seems to be failing on the CI build :(. Is it a matter of CMake version inconsistency?
I also had to modify this file to get the right thing to happen on Windows: the replacement I used there was:
add_custom_command(TARGET highwayhash_copy_headers_to_destination PRE_BUILD

Would that maybe work in both cases?
